EmailTemplate.subject: Want To Save Time Like These Pilots?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Hi, {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}} Honeywell Aerospace has helped many Chief Pilots and dispatchers across the world to save time and money creating better and faster flight plans. They used Honeywellâ€™s GoDirect Flight Planning tool to improve efficiency with route overlays, mapping, and tracking. And, they reduced costs with plans that more accurately track fuel consumption with OEM specific performance. Click this link to see exactly how it works <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/flight-planning?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_godirectflight_bga&utm_term=email3]]>. When I heard about {{lead.Company Name:default=your company}}, I knew Honeywell Aerospace could improve flight planning efficiency. How does your calendar look this week to jump on a quick call to discuss?
Best wishes,
Maggie Deane Specialist - Inside Sales GoDirect Mobile: 480-225-9416 Email: Maggie.deane@honeywell.com <[[mailto:Maggie.deane@honeywell.com]]>
